EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Leader roles with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
The first wave of the 2016 NCS summer programme kicks off on the 18th June! This year we’ve received an unprecedented number of applications for our seasonal roles, and have offered over 4,500 roles.
But we’re still looking for Leaders….
Having great leaders supporting the programme and directing our young people through their NCS journeys is essential.
We’ve noticed that you haven’t applied to work on the summer programme this year, and are hoping to change your mind. Here are a few reasons why you should join us:
New locations and wave layouts - flexible dates and locations available. We have some spaces on waves starting in the next few weeks!
Top up your salary over the summer
Streamlined recruitment process - no need to complete an application form or assess - just get in touch with us now!
To refresh your memory, the Programme Leader and Assistant Programme Leader role descriptions are available on our website: ncsthechallenge.org/jobs.
What do I need to do?
Simply email us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org with your availability and where you’d like to work. We’ll direct you to the correct staffing team who will get you booked onto your training and sort out any compliance before you start on the programme.
You’ll need to have an Enhanced DBS with Children’s Barred List checked to take on a leader role - if you already have one dated from 1st January 2015, great! If not, you can apply for one through us.
Any questions?
If you have any questions about our remaining leader roles and locations, please email us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
We hope to hear from you soon!
Best wishes,
The Challenge Staffing Team
